title: Revisiting Cambodias Killing Fields 30 years later

tasks.task: Tractor operation and crop cultivation in Cambodia.
subtasks: Drive tractor to transport fertilizers.
Operate tractor for plowing the fields.
Apply pesticides using tractor-mounted sprayer.
Plant rice seeds using precision broadcasting.
Monitor crop growth and fertilize as needed.
Manage irrigation systems for rice paddies.
Use combine harvester for post-harvest processing.
Operate grain dryer to ensure proper storage conditions.
Conduct on-farm surveys and collect seed samples.
Implement integrated pest management strategies.

tasks.task: Agronomy and crop improvement activities.
subtasks: Evaluate and introduce new rice varieties.
Develop agronomic practices for rain-fed environments.
Enhance rice yield through sustainable farming techniques.
Promote traditional deepwater rice cultivation.
Collaborate with farmers and extension agents.

tasks.task: Capacity building and education.
subtasks: Training Cambodian farmers in modern farming techniques.
Translating educational materials into Khmer language.
Organizing hands-on workshops and training programs.
Implementing English language training for staff.
Facilitating university-level education opportunities.
Establishing partnerships between Cambodian and international institutes.

tasks.task: Gene conservation and variety reintroduction.
subtasks: Collect and preserve traditional rice varieties.
Store rice samples in gene banks.
Reintroduce selected varieties to farmers’ fields.
Monitor and evaluate re-introduced varieties’ performance.

tasks.task: Tractor Operation and Crop Cultivation (Cambodia)**
Agronomy and Crop Improvement**
Capacity Building**
Gene Conservation**

** Given the focus on agricultural development, the transcript is **relevant**. Key physical tasks involve operating farm equipment (MAINTASK), agronomy (crop variety evaluation, weatherproofing), capacity building (training, translation), and gene conservation (seed collection, storage). Subtasks detail regular activities:
Tractor operation and crop cultivation in Cambodia.
